Detailed Description

This class implements the standard Hough transformation method for line detection.

Example for using this class: Files used: mellem-hough-test.zip 


        z1.Load("mellem-hough-test.bmp");

        // A new CHoughSHTLine object is created and initialized
        CHoughSHTLine Hough(cout,false);
        Hough.Initialize(HIGHCOLOR,pictureThreshold);

        // Hough transformation is performed on the image 
        Hough.PerformTransform(z1,lineThickness);

        // The peaks are extracted from the hough space
        vector<CParameter2D<float> > Peaks;
        Peaks = Hough.FindPeaks(CHoughBase::BUTTERFLY,houghSpaceThreshold);

        // The original image is reconstructed by drawing the found linies
        z2.Alloc(z1.GetWidth(),z1.GetHeight(),8,255);
        for(int x=0;x<Peaks.size();x++)
        {
        CHoughBase::DrawLine(z2, Peaks[x]);
        }

        // The reconstruction is saved to disk
        z2.Save("result.bmp");

        // The a image of the hough space is saved to disk
        Hough.ToImage(z3);
        z3.Save("hspace.bmp");
Output from above code is: 

        Quantizations are: (556,355)
        Step values are  : (0.00565035,1.99467)
        Theta value range: (-0.0113007,3.13029)
        Rho value range  : (-353.553,354.553)
        Computing sine and cosine value vectors...
        Performing standard Hough transform...
        Finished procentage:
        ################################################################################
        ###################
        Standard Hough transform for lines finished.
The example writes file 'result.bmp' in current directory, it contains an image with the detected lines drawn in it. File 'hspace.bmp' contains the internal Hough-space. File 'butterfly.bmp' shows the detected peaks in the Hough-space. A standard Hough space is implemented, and different peak detection methods can be chosen.

This class is part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.

Author:
Qinyin Zhou <qinyin@mip.sdu.dk>
Version:
0.90

Peak detection part of the algorithm.

Parameters:

All peak parameters are stored in a vector.

bool ipl::CHoughSHTLine::Initialize (  COLORTYPE    Color,
UINT8    Threshold,
CHoughBase::ORIGINTYPE    OriginType = CHoughBase::CENTER_UP,
CHoughBase::PARAMETERTYPE    ParamType = CHoughBase::NORMAL_PARAM
) 
 

Initializes CHoughSHTLine.

Parameters:
Color  Color type, low (black background) or high color (white background).
Threshold  Threshold for pixel input value. The value must be set after the image type (8-bit or 1-bit).
OriginType  Type of the Origin location. CENTER_UP or LEFT_UPPER, defaults to CENTER_UP.
ParamType  Type of parametrization, defaults to NORMAL_PARAM.

Definition at line 46 of file hough_sht_line.cpp.

bool ipl::CHoughSHTLine::PerformTransform (  const CStdImage &    Source,
int    Thickness = 1
) 
 

StandardHoughTransform Performs the standard Hough transform for the entire image.

Parameters:
Source  Source image, must be 1 or 8 b/p gray tone palette.
Thickness  Thickness of the lines appeared in the source image. The default thickness is 1.

void ipl::CHoughSHTLine::ToImage (  CStdImage &    outImg ) 
 

Convert the Hough space into an image.

The Hough space image will be scaled to 8-bit image.

Parameters:
outImg  The image will be located in this object.
